channel.title: Music on More Muc Than You Can Handle
channel.description: Recent content in Music on More Muc Than You Can Handle

item.title: How Does One Introduce Rush?
item.author: scottmuc@gmail.com (Scott Muc)
item.description: Earlier this year I was chatting with a friend about the band Rush. I said they played a fundamental part of who I am and still have an impact on me today. This prompted them to ask how they could learn more. The most wonderful thing for any Rush fan to hear. I’ll start by describing how I learnt about them. It was through my brothers who are older than me and they still joke about how as a child I would giggle to this guitar part in The Trees.
